text: Aaram Vardil Aabhyanthara Kalaham is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Murali, starring Vineeth and Siddique in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Thilakan * Baiju * Siddique * Adoor Bhavani * Bobby Kottarakkara * Johny * Mala Aravindan * Poojappura Ravi * Santhakumari * Sugandhi * Vincent * Vineeth ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Aaram Vardil Aabhyanthara Kalaham
